data.actual_result: Right click context menu clips behind the Discord logo
data.expected_result: Right click context menu goes into view without clipping behind anything
data.short_description: Right clicking the top server on your list causes context menu to hide behind Discord logo [200 zoom]
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your zoom level to 200 - Right click the top server on your list - Observe the top of the right click context menu
